Configuration.Name: Twilio SMS Notifications Addon
Configuration.Author: Atlas Systems, Inc.
Configuration.Description: Sends SMS Notifications using the Twilio API

Setting.name: AccountSID
Setting.Description: The Twilio Account SID provided in your Twilio account settings.

Setting.name: AuthToken
Setting.Description: The Twilio AuthToken provided in your Twilio account Settings.

Setting.name: FromNumber
Setting.Description: A Twilio phone number enabled for the type of message you wish to send. Only phone numbers or short codes purchased from Twilio work here.

Setting.name: ActiveNVTGC
Setting.Description: If shared server, a comma separated list of NVTGC's that use this addon for sending SMS notifications. This setting is ignored for single server instances.
